title: SRNet: A spatial-relationship aware point-set classification method for multiplexed pathology images
abstract: Point-set classification for multiplexed pathology images aims to distinguish between the spatial configurations of cells within multiplexed immuno-fluorescence (mIF) images of different diseases. This problem is important towards aiding pathologists in diagnosing diseases (e
